articles.title: India vs South Africa Live Score Updates, 2nd ODI: Nandre Burger-led South Africa's pace attack restrict IND to 211 runs | Mint - Mint
articles.description: India vs South Africa Live Score Updates, 2nd ODI: Ind vs SA, KL Rahul and Sai Sudharsan shined as India lost all batters on a score 211 runs. The rest of the batters couldn't display much today and South Africa's Nandre Burger clinched 3 wickets to restrict …
